original_text: Some of them had used magic to do powerful things. These people brought all their special books and they burned them in a fire. Everybody saw what they did. The books had cost a lot of money. The value of all the books was 50,000 silver coins.
korean_text: 또 마술을 행하던 많은 사람이 그 책을 모아 가지고 와서 모든 사람 앞에서 불사르니 그 책 값을 계산한즉 은 오만이나 되더라

sentences.original_text: Some of them had used magic
These people brought all their special books
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들은 자신의 모든 특별한 책들을 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: and they burned them in a fire

sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람들이 그들이 한 일을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: The books had cost a lot of money
The value of all the books was 50,000 silver coins
